revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Bandspeed |model=3100AG |revision=(BSP-AMAP3100AG) |fcc_date=10/28/2007 |manuf_country= |is_manuf=No |manuf= |type=access point |fcc_id=VE53100AG,VE53100AGV2 |pcb_id= |pwr_v=5 |pwr_amp=2.6 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_poe=af |cpu1_brand=Intel XScale |cpu1_model=IXP425 |cpu1_cspeed=533 |fla1=16 |fla1_brand= |fla1_model= |ram1=64 |ram1_brand=Micron |ram1_model=MT48LC16M16A2-75 |ram1_num=2 |expansion_if_types=Mini PCI, Compact Flash |expansion_minipci_num=2 |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial=yes,, RJ-45,, (115200,8,N,1) |wi1_module=EnGenius NMP-8602 PLUS |wi1_module_if=Mini PCI |wi1_chip1_brand=Atheros |wi1_chip1_model=AR5414 |wi1_chip2_brand= |wi1_chip2_model= |wi1_802dot11_protocols=abg |wi1_ant_conn= |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu= |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=2 |wan_ports= |flags=spectrum analyzer |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=abg |default_ssid=Bandspeed |default_ssid_regex=^Bandspeed$ |default_ip=192.168.1.1 |default_user=Bandspeed |default_pass=Bandspeed |oui=00:06:B8 |oui_eth=00:06:B8 }} {{TagLine|AirMaestro 3100AG Virtual Controller Access Point}} :[http://www.bandspeed.com/products/docs/3100AGVC_Datasheet.pdf Datasheet]
"PCB: 940521-0001", "Rev C", "ASY: 9405230-0001", and "Design & Engineered :by Bandspeed, Inc." is silkscreened on the wireless module.
The processor used appears to be a PRIXP425BD (XScale IXP425 @533MHz). :The mainboard is a [http://www.adiengineering.com '''ADI Engineering'''] product.
{{See also|ADI Engineering Pronghorn SBC250}}
Per '''Bandspeed''''s datasheet.. *This device has three WLAN radios, one of which will act as a dedicated :interference / WLAN security sensor and functions as a spectrum analyzer *The device weighs [[Weight::1.9lbs]]
Default settings are per '''Bandspeed''''s manual. :Presumed 00:06:B8 OUI based on the manual's sample MACs...
